Package poli.persistenciadatostransaccionales.chatapplication.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
poli.persistenciadatostransaccionales.chatapplication.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
This class is responsible for handling communication with an individual client.

  • Field Details

    • clientSocket

      private final Socket clientSocket
      Socket to manage the client's connection. This socket represents the connection to the client.

    • username

      private String username
      The username of the client. This is set after the client successfully connects and authenticates.

    • currentChatWithUser

      private String currentChatWithUser
      The username of the other client with whom this client is currently chatting. If null, it means the client is not currently engaged in a private chat.

    • clientHandlers

      private static final ConcurrentHashMap<String,ClientHandler> clientHandlers
      A thread-safe map of active client handlers, keyed by username. This allows the server to access the handler for each connected client.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler(Socket socket)
      Constructor that initializes the client handler with the client's socket.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket connected to the client

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      The main run method that handles incoming messages from the client.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • registerUsername

      private void registerUsername(BufferedReader in, PrintWriter out) throws IOException
      Registers the username for the client ensuring it is unique and valid.
      Parameters:
      in - the input stream reader
      out - the output stream writer
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • cleanup

      private void cleanup()
      Cleans up resources and notifies other clients when a user disconnects.

    • logUserActivity

      public static void logUserActivity(String username, boolean isConnected)
      Logs the user's connection or disconnection.
      Parameters:
      username - username for the client
      isConnected - true if the user is connecting, false if disconnecting

    • broadcastClientList

      private void broadcastClientList()
      Broadcasts the list of currently connected users to all clients.

    • handlePrivateMessage

      private void handlePrivateMessage(String inputLine)
      Handles private messages between clients. If a current chat partner is not set, it attempts to set one. If a chat partner is set, it forwards the message to them.
      Parameters:
      inputLine - the input message from the client

    • attemptToSetChatPartner

      private void attemptToSetChatPartner(String potentialPartner)
      Attempts to set a chat partner if one is not currently set. If the user does not exist or is not connected, prompts for a valid username.
      Parameters:
      potentialPartner - the potential chat partner's username

    • promptForValidUsername

      private void promptForValidUsername(String invalidUsername)
      Prompts the user to enter a different username because the provided one is invalid.
      Parameters:
      invalidUsername - the invalid username that was entered

    • forwardMessageToCurrentChatPartner

      private void forwardMessageToCurrentChatPartner(String message)
      Forwards a message to the current chat partner. If the chat partner has disconnected, prompts to start a chat with a new user.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to forward

    • sendMessageToUser

      private void sendMessageToUser(String user, String message)
      Sends a message to a specified user by looking up their ClientHandler and invoking sendMessage on it.
      Parameters:
      user - the username of the recipient
      message - the message to be sent

    • sendMessage

      private void sendMessage(String message)
      Sends a message to the client connected to this handler by writing to the client's output stream.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send

    • isUsernameTaken

      private boolean isUsernameTaken(String username)
      Checks if a username is already taken by another client.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      Returns:
      true if the username is already taken, false otherwise

    • getInvalidUsernameMessage

      private String getInvalidUsernameMessage()
      Returns an appropriate message if the username is invalid.
      Returns:
      a string indicating the reason the username is invalid
